message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80. Can you meet me there?
I understand that $80 is a good starting point, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product. Can you meet me halfway?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $82.50. I'm willing to pay a bit more, but I'd like to get closer to my target price

I understand that you're close to your target price, and I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm going to offer you $83.50. It's still a great deal, and I think you'll really enjoy the product. Can you consider this offer?
